Word to PDF Converter

Convert Microsoft Word documents to PDF format privately in your browser. No file upload required - secure, fast, and completely free DOCX to PDF conversion.

DOCX files only • No file size limit • Completely private

Conversion Results

Development Note

This Word to PDF converter is currently in development and requires additional JavaScript libraries for full functionality. The interface is ready, but the actual conversion requires integration with libraries like pdf-lib or mammoth.js.

How to Use

  1. 1. Select one or more Word documents (.docx format)
  2. 2. Choose your preferred page orientation and size
  3. 3. Select options for preserving links and bookmarks
  4. 4. Click "Convert to PDF" to start processing
  5. 5. Download your converted PDF files
  6. 6. All processing happens locally - no files uploaded!

Frequently Asked Questions

How to convert Word documents to PDF without uploading files?

Our Word to PDF converter uses modern web technologies to process documents entirely in your browser. Your files never leave your device, ensuring complete privacy and security. The conversion happens locally using JavaScript libraries.

What Word document formats are supported?

Our converter supports modern Word formats including .docx files. For older .doc formats, we recommend first opening the file in Microsoft Word and saving it as .docx format for best compatibility.

Will the formatting be preserved in the PDF?

Yes, our converter maintains most formatting including fonts, styles, images, tables, and layouts. However, some advanced features like macros, embedded objects, or complex formatting may not be perfectly preserved.

Is there a file size limit for conversion?

The converter can handle most standard documents, but performance depends on your device's memory and processing power. Very large documents (over 100MB) or those with many images may take longer to process.

Can I convert password-protected Word documents?

Currently, our converter does not support password-protected Word documents. Please remove the password protection in Microsoft Word first, then use our converter.
